idea:
https://www.kisan4u.com

Kisan4u, just as our name suggests, we are for farmers. We have launched a mobile based application with a goal to digitize Indian agriculture sector and to make its backbone Indian farmers tech friendly. Kisan4u aims to make farmers grow technically as well as financially using technology as a bridge between them and sustainable agriculture. On our app farmers can get on time and free of cost consultations from our team of agronomists, whom we call Kisan4u doctors, of their crops, livestock, machinery, yield and market prices of their crops so the farmer can get most benefits out of his current assets . Our application shows accurate weather predictions for next five days so farmers can plan their watering and other activities accordingly. He can consult our experts thorough our application and our 24x7 helpline number and his query will handled by a team of qualified experts who will closely analyze the situation and provide the farmer with best solution with minimum expenditure. Kisan4u app will help farmers to eliminate following problems:-

1. Crop Knowledge:-Farmers can get information about various number of crops on kisan4u app. We have added more than 100 crops on our application with proper information on their sowing season, fertilizer requirements, seed spacing, seed treatment, pests and diseases associated with that crop and their solutions. 

2. Consultancy:-Whenever a field is attacked by pests and diseases and farmer has to take consultancy from an expert, our kisan4u doctors will always be there for their help. They just have to open their app and click picture of the pest or disease infected crop and upload, Kisan4u doctor will analyze the photo in real time and provide solution to the problem on application or over call. This consultacy will be provided free of cost.

43 Trade:- We plan to keep farmer updated on current market rates of their crops so that he can sell his crop yield at best possible prices to best buyers. He can also sell/rent his machinery or livestock .

4. Videos:-Farmers can watch exclusive knowledgeable videos on our application about their crops, machinery and livestock which will help him manage them economically.

5. Quality Products:- Kisan4u ensures farmers get most benefits in least cost, so we have added top quality certified products on our application for farmers to buy, these products will help them increase their crop quality by eliminating pests and diseases, also increase increase yield by using best fertilizers available in market.

6. Future planning:- Our future planning includes providing farmers with banking services right on our application, by connecting them to banks and making them take benefits of on going government schemes and providing consultancy with krishi loans which will help them make farming more convenient and they can focus on increasing their yield without worrying about financials.

With above points we tend to justify our tagline, “Agri-Solution’s at Farmers Door”.
name: KISAN4U MARKETING PRIVATE LIMITED

Anupam has always been a fitness enthusiast, and a cricket fan. His moto is "Be the Voice and not the Echo".

idea:
Atmanirbhar Aroma LLP is specializing in cultivating, harvesting, distilling, manufacturing & sourcing high quality aromatic oils.

In line with the idea of Atmanirbhar Bharat we operate jointly with farmers by obtaining crops at a fair price from them and processing with necessary quality checks making Aromatic Oils available to the buyers.

We are under the Aroma Mission striving hard to facilitate income generating opportunities for farmers and providing livelihood to agro-labour force as well as ensuring availability of indigenous essential oils for the medicine and pharmaceutical industry in the market.
name: ATMANIRBHAR AROMA LLP
